name: Strategic technical direction: monolith vs microservices
description: Our system is growing and becoming harder to deploy and scale. We need to decide on technical direction for next 2 years. Should we invest in monolith optimization, migrate to microservices, use serverless architecture, or hybrid approach?
options: Optimize monolith - make it faster, better organized, easier to deploy
Migrate to microservices - higher complexity, better scalability
Go serverless - reduced ops burden, changes architecture significantly
Hybrid - microservices where it makes sense, monolith for stable components
constraints: Team has experience with monoliths only
Have 3 months to make decision, 6 months to start implementation
Need to maintain current feature velocity during transition
Budget is limited for learning curve
